description.value: ValueSet IMMZD2DTMeningococcalMenAConjugateVaccine1Dose for IMMZ.D2.DT.Meningococcal.MenA conjugate vaccine 1 dose. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a meningococcal vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: MenA conjugate vaccine, 1-dose schedule
